short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple configurable extension that hides emails visually with duplicate sender/subject in Outlook (when reading pane is not enabled)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚ú® - New features can be requested through Github and I will try to add them.
‚öôÔ∏è - Various configuration options are available.
‚ÑπÔ∏è - By default, duplicate means the content in the sender and subject columns (as shown in the list of emails) are identical (configurable).
‚ö†Ô∏è This extension only works when the reading pane is disabled (or placed at the bottom).
‚úèÔ∏è - It modifies the subject to show the total number of duplicates (configurable).
‚è±Ô∏è - It runs the logic every 2 seconds (configurable).
‚èπÔ∏è - If you need to see/interact with the duplicates, toggle off the extension.
üõ†Ô∏è - Fixes / new versions take some time to publish, patience is appreciated.
üìû - If you have issues, reach out on Github.
